statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Marcellus Garrick scored 20 points, Donovan Fields had 17 points and a career-high 11 assists and Cal Poly beat Pepperdine 91-81 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Garrick, Fields lead Cal Poly over Pepperdine 91-81
article.linkText: Garrick, Fields lead Cal Poly over Pepperdine 91-81
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. -- Marcellus Garrick scored 20 points, Donovan Fields had 17 points and a career-high 11 assists and Cal Poly beat Pepperdine 91-81 on Saturday night. Garrick was 7 of 15 from the floor and made three 3-pointers. Fields was 5-of-10 shooting and made all six free-throw attempts. Jakub Niziol added 14 points, and Hank Hollingsworth had 12 points and 10 rebounds for Cal Poly (4-4). Kameron Edwards and Colbey Ross scored 21 points apiece to lead Pepperdine (2-6). Nolan Taylor chipped in 14 points. Edwards' 3-pointer pulled the Waves to 76-73 with 3:10 left. Garrick made two 3s and Luke Meikle added another and Cal Poly stretched its lead to 85-74 with 1:15 remaining. Cal Poly made 11 of 27 from long range, but Pepperdine was just 2-of-11 shooting from beyond the arc and missed six free throws. Pepperdine had its last lead, 59-57 with nine minutes left.
